newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Wee Poh Holdings receives nod to list on SESDAQ.
newsitem.headline: Wee Poh Holdings receives nod to list on SESDAQ.

text.p: Integrated infrastructure company Wee Poh Holdings Ltd said on Friday it had received in-principle approval to list on SESDAQ from the stock exchange.
The group provides a spectrum of civil engineering works ranging from design, planning and building of foundation works to building of expressways, underpasses and bridges.

The company said in a statement the group has made inroads into foreign infrastructure markets with completion of a road system in Batam Industrial Park, Indonesia and a major public road construction in Cambodia.

The group's turnover more than doubled to Singapore $63.3 million in 1996 from S$25.7 million in 1992, the statement said. Pre-tax profit quadrupled to about S$6.0 million from S$1.3 million over the same period.
